summary: A Software Engineer with over 8 years of experience in IT and 5+ years as a Frontend Developer, specializing in React and React Native for web and mobile application development. Holds a Bachelor's degree in Programming Engineering and a Master's degree in Applied Informatics. Has worked on numerous projects as a React Native Developer. In addition to React and RN, is proficient in Node.js, GraphQL, and RESTful APIs. Prefers Git as a version control system. Committed to the principles of XP (Extreme Programming) and values DRY, KISS, and YAGNI principles. Passionate about writing clean, maintainable code.
